Bash(printf '@echo off\\nchcp 936 >nul\\necho ========================================\\necho   博客一键部署\\necho ========================================\\necho.\\necho [1/2] 正在构建项目...\\ncd /d D:\\\\code\\\\blog\\\\docs\\ncall pnpm run build\\nif %%ERRORLEVEL%% NEQ 0 \(\\n    echo.\\n    echo 构建失败！\\n    pause\\n    exit /b 1\\n\)\\necho.\\necho [2/2] 正在上传到服务器...\\nset PUTTY_DIR=C:\\\\Users\\\\lvqi\\\\PuTTY\\nset SERVER=47.111.1.180\\nset USER=root\\nset PASSWORD=Qwe9647.\\nset HOSTKEY=ssh-ed25519 0 SHA256:6R7sVNdsSNncWUQ0diOY0SxEMqNY8do8rwKj+68fFKc\\nset LOCAL_DIR=D:\\\\code\\\\blog\\\\docs\\\\src\\\\.vuepress\\\\dist\\nset REMOTE_DIR=/usr/local/nginx/html/gyd-blog/dist\\necho 正在清空远程目录...\\n""%%PUTTY_DIR%%\\\\PLINK.EXE"" -batch -hostkey ""%%HOSTKEY%%"" -pw %%PASSWORD%% %%USER%%@%%SERVER%% ""rm -rf %%REMOTE_DIR%%/*""\\necho 正在上传文件...\\n""%%PUTTY_DIR%%\\\\PSCP.EXE"" -batch -hostkey ""%%HOSTKEY%%"" -pw %%PASSWORD%% -r %%LOCAL_DIR%%\\\\* %%USER%%@%%SERVER%%:%%REMOTE_DIR%%/\\necho.\\necho ========================================\\necho   部署完成！\\necho   访问地址: http://www.gydblog.com\\necho ========================================\\npause\\n')

Bash(python3 -c "
content = ''''''@echo off
chcp 936 >nul
echo ========================================
echo   博客一键部署
echo ========================================
echo.

echo [1/2] 正在构建项目...
cd /d D:\\code\\blog\\docs
call pnpm run build

if %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 \(
    echo.
    echo 构建失败！
    pause
    exit /b 1
\)

echo.
echo [2/2] 正在上传到服务器...

set PUTTY_DIR=C:\\Users\\lvqi\\PuTTY
set SERVER=47.111.1.180
set USER=root
set PASSWORD=Qwe9647.
set HOSTKEY=ssh-ed25519 0 SHA256:6R7sVNdsSNncWUQ0diOY0SxEMqNY8do8rwKj+68fFKc
set LOCAL_DIR=D:\\code\\blog\\docs\\src\\.vuepress\\dist
set REMOTE_DIR=/usr/local/nginx/html/gyd-blog/dist

echo 正在清空远程目录...
""%PUTTY_DIR%\\PLINK.EXE"" -batch -hostkey ""%HOSTKEY%"" -pw %PASSWORD% %USER%@%SERVER% ""rm -rf %REMOTE_DIR%/*""

echo 正在上传文件...
""%PUTTY_DIR%\\PSCP.EXE"" -batch -hostkey ""%HOSTKEY%"" -pw %PASSWORD% -r %LOCAL_DIR%\\* %USER%@%SERVER%:%REMOTE_DIR%/

echo.
echo ========================================
echo   部署完成！
echo   访问地址: http://www.gydblog.com
echo ========================================
pause
''''''
with open\(''deploy-cn-fixed.bat'', ''w'', encoding=''gbk''\) as f:
    f.write\(content\)
print\(''Chinese version created''\)
")
